body:
Using the Helm 3 libraries, I'm looking for a consistent way to populate an action struct's chart values from an existing `map[string]interface{}`.

### Install 

`install.Run` uses `i.rawValues` (a `map[string]interface{}`) when calling `ToRenderValues`

https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/2a3b7b5395bb7d71919ed3592c8c63c425353851/pkg/action/install.go#L128

`action.Install` exposes `Values` as `[]string` from its embedded `ValuesOptions` struct. It's `rawValues` is unexported.

https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/2a3b7b5395bb7d71919ed3592c8c63c425353851/pkg/action/install.go#L65-L89

So to populate values for an install, it looks like I have to:
1. Marshal my `map[string]interface{}` value out to a temporary YAML file
2. Set `install.ValueFiles`
3. Call `install.ValueOptions.MergeValues`
4. Call `install.Run`
5. Cleanup the temporary file.

### Upgrade

`upgrade.Run` uses `u.Values` when calling `ToRenderValues` (and seems to ignore `u.rawValues`?)

https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/2a3b7b5395bb7d71919ed3592c8c63c425353851/pkg/action/upgrade.go#L157

So since `Values` is exported publicly as a `map[string]interface{}` (shadowing `ValuesOptions.Values`),  it looks like I can set `upgrade.Value` directly, and everything seems to work.

https://github.com/helm/helm/blob/2a3b7b5395bb7d71919ed3592c8c63c425353851/pkg/action/upgrade.go#L37-L59

Just want to make sure I'm understanding things correctly and to see if this discrepancy is intended :slightly_smiling_face:

Thanks!

title: Helm 3: action.Install and action.Upgrade have different mechanisms to set values
